columns.content:
To access Figma, you need a Figma account with an SEB email address. Find all the information you need to get your Figma license on [Confluence.](https://confluence-general.sebank.se/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=FDT&title=Figma+design+tool+Home)

If you need help with accessing SEB:s Figma libraries, please contact [figmasupport@seb.se](mailto:figmasupport@seb.se).

sections.title: Figma libraries
sections.section-content: A library in Figma is a collection of design assets, like components, styles, and variables. These design assets live in a single file, but can be reused across different files or projects.
